bug.author: Usmaniatech
bug.description: After training the exe file using jupyter notebook, the exe file hangs and I am not able to see the trained exe file. I am storing the weights of actor and critic in .pth file. I have tried training the tennis example, but facing the same issue. Is there any way that I can generate .pb and .bytes model using jupyter notebook ?

comments.comment: hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Usmaniatech>@Usmaniatech</denchmark-link> - can you provide your jupyter notebook? and also what you mean by "trained exe file"?

I have changed the scripts. It is solved. Now I am using this repo and this works fine. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/katnoria/unityml-tennis>https://github.com/katnoria/unityml-tennis</denchmark-link>
